snippet.title: Apotris - Marathon/150 Lines
snippet.description:
EDIT 5/6/23: This project has since been DMCA'd.  You will need to look into other resources to get this game now.

Looking through homebrew today.

If you've played Tetris then you probably already know what this is about.  Interestingly enough, this is a GBA homebrew variant of the game and, for what it offers, it's quite a good take on the game.  This one is the classic 150-line.  Get a x22 Tetris streak before I inevitably flub it then get sloppy to clear the run in a little over 7 minutes.  There's a lot more to this game than Marathon, quite a bit of customization and, frankly, a good amount of polish for a homebrew, for sure.

If you're a Touhou fan, you probably already recognize the background music during the run.  Cirno's Theme/Beloved Tomboyish Girl BGM playing or what is actually an arrangement done by Nikku4211.  This may or may not have influenced me uploading this or playing this game in general.  Your call.

The download for Apotris itself can be found here: https://akouzoukos.itch.io/apotris

The arrangement mentioned above can be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n-YFj52Nxeg
